formattedAddress: 39 W 21st St, New York, NY 10010, USA
adrFormatAddress: 39 W 21st St, New York, NY 10010, USA

originalText.text:
I have been taking classes at this Pure Barre location for over a year now, and I absolutely love it. The instructors are all so kind, helpful and motivational, and those I see often have taken the time to get to know my name and give shoutouts during class for extra motivation.

In particular, I have taken a lot of classes with Isabel, Veronica, Olivia and Sara B, and always had great experiences with them. The GM, Emily, is also extremely kind and helpful. She always greets me with a smile and warm welcome. She has been super helpful and knowledgeable when it comes to answering any questions I have as well.

The people at this location are great and make working out such a positive experience for me. I truly look forward to coming to this studio each week!

originalText.text:
Love Pure Barre and this location is combined with a CycleBar, which I've not tried.  The studio here is one big square room which makes it easy to see the instructor from any side.

I typically go to one class so I can't say much about other days however the staff is always friendly and helpful.  They have multiple changing rooms and a full locker room for men and women with showers.  Wonderful if you do an am class and need to be presentable later.

text.text:

originalText.text: I have to admit, I didn’t know exactly what I was in for or how challenging the workout was going to be when I signed up for my first trial class having never ever done barre or regular workout classes before. I’ve also never really enjoyed any exercise with a high-intensity nature due to my scoliosis so I wanted to try something low-impact. The PB team at Flatiron has made every experience since the first such a positive one. Everyone is genuinely welcoming and approachable. I was shocked that Emily the manager was able to recognize me by name just a few classes in. The instructors are so kind, supportive, and really take the time to engage with everyone in the room from start to finish. The space is also impeccable and the locker/shower rooms are stocked with necessities you might need after a workout! I get my butt kicked every time I come in but this is the only kind of exercise that I can’t wait to come back to as soon as it’s done. I wish I had the schedule to be able to come in more often. Thank you PB!

originalText.text: PB Flatiron is a great studio. It's in an accessible location with a very spacious layout, lockers, and locker rooms with shows and complimentary products. The staff is very friendly and the instructors take the time to get to know everyone, their fitness levels, and any injuries. All of the instructors are great but Gabby, Veronica, and Sarah B. are amazing! Only critique would be that the class sizes can get too crowded so less time spent on individual form which could lead to injuries, and also less comfort since we're still living in the COVID era.

originalText.text: I love it here!! This is the first time I’ve ever consistently gone to a fitness class. From my first class, I was hooked. It’s such a welcoming environment and all the staff really takes the time to get to know you. The instructors are also wonderful and know exactly when you need extra encouragement to get through a tough workout. I’ll be coming here for as long as possible. Shoutout to Emily for always taking time to answer my questions and help me!!
